item.title: Recording Videos For Tiktok Shop - Upwork
item.description:
This will be a 5 minute recording that you will do each day with product in hand that I send you. I will teach you how to make the video you will record and send to me. Super easy job and will increase the pay once we get going good :)

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 23, 2024 23:58 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, MOV, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: MP4, MOV, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply
